amendatorysection.catchline: Nebraska Wheat Development, Utilization, and Marketing Board; created; initial members.
amendatorysection.para: There is hereby established the Nebraska Wheat Development, Utilization, and Marketing Board. The present members of the Nebraska Wheat Development, Utilization, and Marketing Committee shall serve as members of such board until the expiration of their respective terms, after which time members shall be appointed by the Governor to the board pursuant to section 2-2305.
